Stack AI Complete Guide 2026

Build AI Agents and Workflows Without Code

What is Stack AI?

Stack AI is a no-code platform for building AI agents and automating workflows. It allows you to create powerful AI-powered applications without writing code, using a visual drag-and-drop interface.

Key Features

  • No-Code Builder: Visual interface for creating AI workflows
  • Pre-Built Templates: Start with templates for common use cases
  • API Integration: Connect with any service via API
  • Multi-Model Support: Works with GPT-4, Claude, and more
  • Deploy Anywhere: Export as API or embed in your app

Popular Use Cases

Customer Support Bots

Automate customer inquiries with AI

Content Generation

Create blog posts, social media, and marketing copy

Data Processing

Extract insights from documents and data

Pricing

Free Tier: Available with limited usage

Paid Plans: Start from $29/month

Custom enterprise plans available
